definition: corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The player should learn to use a cross over step to recover from wide balls.
sentences.chinese: 选手应学习在回击大外角球来球后，以交叉跨步回防。

sentences.english: The 29th minute, Cologne middle place Antar meets a corner kick mallet to hit the crossbeam.
sentences.chinese: 第29分钟，科隆中场安塔尔就接角球头槌击中横梁。

sentences.english: Corner kicks have become an important way to shoot and score.
sentences.chinese: 角球已成为射门得分的重要手段。

sentences.english: The pitcher threw a high inside pitch to brush the batter back.
sentences.chinese: 这投手一个高内角球，使击球手紧张而打不出好球。

sentences.english: Only at corners or free-kicks can we both go.
sentences.chinese: 只有在发角球或者任意球时，我们都可以上前进攻。

sentences.english: Again a corner was the source of Norwich's problems.
sentences.chinese: 诺维奇的防守问题又是角球。

sentences.english: David Beckham's corner kick is a threat to England's opposition.
sentences.chinese: 碧咸的角球对英格兰的对手构成了一定的威胁。

sentences.english: Zola takes, Cordoba heads clear at the far post.
sentences.chinese: 对方角球，佐拉主罚，科尔多巴在远端头取解围。

sentences.english: He gave a corner and we've got to defend better from that.
sentences.chinese: 裁判给了角球，我们应该要防得更好。

sentences.english: Ukraine had the Saudi defence under severe pressure with a series of corners.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰队连续获得角球让沙特队防线处在高压下。

sentences.english: When the ball came over, Sheva reached it first but headed off-target.
sentences.chinese: 角球开出后，舍瓦碰到了皮球，只可惜打偏了。

sentences.english: Sneijder's goal followed a corner kick from Robben.
sentences.chinese: 斯内德的得分来自鲁本的一记角球。

sentences.english: United's best chances of the first period came from corners.
sentences.chinese: 曼联上半场取得最好的机会来自角球。

sentences.english: They won three corners all of which Drogba headed away.
sentences.chinese: 他们获得了三个角球，但全数被德罗巴以头球解围。

sentences.english: If the ball, leaves the ends of the pitch, a corner is given.
sentences.chinese: 如果球越过了球门线，则会判角球。

sentences.english: The winning goal was from one of his superbly struck corners.
sentences.chinese: 致胜一球是来自他主罚的一个漂亮角球。

definition: to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
to burst or force open a door/to excommunicate sb (from the Roman Catholic Church)/to score a goal (in football, hockey etc)
to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
to equalize/to level the score/to pull back the advantage
to lift a siege/to help sb out of trouble or embarrassment
